alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 02 at 4:39AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Gulf and southeastern Bay Counties through 515 AM EDT/415 AM CDT/... At 438 AM EDT/338 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mexico Beach, or 14 miles northwest of Port St. Joe, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Callaway, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Allanton, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Bay Harbor, Overstreet, Davis Beach, Millville, Wetappo, Beacon Hill and Saint Joe Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf
